name: Super Extra Team Dungeon Game
summary:
Super Extra Team Dungeon Game is not just a game, but a interactive experience for communities. Get ready to explore the depths of the dungeon, collect treasure and level up with your team.

The spiritual successor to Super Extra Console Dungeon Game, where you can dive deep into the abyss of the dungeon with your stream viewers as your battle party! Awesome pixel art graphics, multiple classes, over 50 monsters, exciting boss fights and more!!!

Now with Discord support! That is right you can connect to your discord server and play with your friends! Plus we support Twitch chat integration for our streamer friends out there.

You can play with the keyboard, controller or the mouse, so get ready and beat those monsters back to oblivion with your community!!!
